author: Carey Smith
title: Accreon Hires New CFO To Support Continued Growth
text:
Accreon is pleased to announce the appointment of Kimberly Post, CPA , as Chief Financial Officer. Kimberly will provide leadership and oversight of Accreon’s financial operations, including accounting, budgeting, reporting, compliance and assist with any strategic acquisitions. Kimberly’s experience guiding healthcare services organizations through significant growth will be a tremendous asset to Accreon’s’ business objectives across North America. Kimberly joins the Accreon team from Beacon Partners located in Weymouth, MA. Beacon Partners, which was recently acquired by KPMG, has provided healthcare management consulting services to hospitals, academic medical centers, physician groups, and health systems across North America for more than 25 years. In her capacity as Chief Financial Officer, Kimberly successfully led all aspects of the financial management of the firm, driving ongoing financial performance and high-level daily operations. As a member of the senior management team, Kimberly played a key role in enhancing profitability and maintaining corporate structure, directing all financial planning, budgeting, procurement and investment activities. During Kimberly’s tenure at Beacon Partners she successfully negotiated an acquisition of a Healthcare Management Consulting Firm and negotiated the acquisition of Beacon Partners.
"I am thrilled to join the Accreon team. I look forward to reinforcing Accreon’s position as a leading healthcare technology and business services firm and helping to execute the long-term vision for the company,’ said Kimberly Post.
“We’re thrilled to expand the strength of our executive team with the addition of Kimberly,” said Accreon President and CEO Eric Demers . “Her proven track record of driving growth for healthcare companies is impressive. We’re looking forward to leveraging her experience and expertise as Accreon evolves to the next level and realizes its full potential.”
Kimberly has a Bachelor of Science, Accounting from Babson College, MA, is a Certified Professional Accountant, and a member of the AICPA, HFMA, MSCPA, and CFO roundtable steering committee.
Accreon is a healthcare technology and business services firm focused on integrating and managing health information. We assist healthcare organizations to: achieve interoperability by integrating their IT eco-system; establish an analytical environment that empowers learning, agility, and performance resulting in improved outcomes, finances and satisfaction; and enhance IT innovation by providing knowledgeable healthcare expertise and tools to bring solutions to market faster. Accreon has delivered services and built solutions across North America for healthcare provider organizations, government entities, medical device companies and EMR vendors. Accreon, headquartered in Boston, MA, has offices in Fredericton, NB, Charlottetown, PEI, Toronto, Ontario. Accreon is a Mansa Capital portfolio company.
